alert.note: Alert for Colquitt; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Thomas and southwestern Colquitt Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 230 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Coolidge, or 11 miles southwest of Moultrie, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Moultrie, Pavo, Coolidge, Riverside, Funston, Autreyville, Enon, Center Hill, South Moultrie, Chastain, Moultrie Municipal A/P, Bay and Murphy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
